solution_line_template: First find the total number of spears she makes from saplings: {spears_per_sapling} spears/sapling * {num_saplings} saplings = <<{spears_per_sapling}*{num_saplings}={spears_from_saplings}>>{spears_from_saplings} spears
Then add the number she makes from the log: {spears_from_saplings} spears + {spears_from_log} spears = <<{spears_from_saplings}+{spears_from_log}={total_spears}>>{total_spears} spears
